item.description:
Hi Everyone,

IT has been a few years since the Glam's were here.

@ This is the only concert i will list for the year, many other groups are listing outdoor concerts so i do not find the need to duplicate or compete, but maybe  only this only ONE time i will list my most favourite performers..

http://www.shoproductions.com/glamourgirls.html

 

@ BESIDES, I THINK THE LADIES ARE QUITE PRETTY AND SING VERY WELL and i like the location and set-up also.

@ The concert starts after the traffic is winding down.

 

Rain obviously cancels the event...check back for the weather update:

http://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?CityName=Windsor&state=CT&site=BOX&textField1=41.85&textField2=-72.65&e=1

 

http://www.usairnet.com/cgi-bin/launch/code.cgi?Submit=Go&sta=KBDL&state=CT

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

All in all, this is my favourite group of performers, they make the stage and audience presence ALIVE and ACTIVE along with a good sounding sound system with the Town Hall   steps as a stage setup.

 

for info:

Thurs., July 19 - Town Green(Windsor, CT) - 7 to 9 p.m. - Show will be on the steps of the Town Hall located on Broad St. in the center of town. For more info. call: (860) 683-8410

 

Park in the back of the Town Hall or nearby streets.

 

FINDING ME:

I like the BIG tree and possibly near the water fountain (if its really hot) for the seating area of choice. Look for me in my Bright Orange Terrorist Hunting Hat

 

Bring you favourite beverage and some food for a relaxing evening.

 

See those that are interested there.. I plan to be there before or by 6:30 pm.

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Look for my ORANGE Hunting Hat near the road and BIG TREE or water fountain area..

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Thurs JUL 19 - GLAMOUR GIRLS CONCERT AT WINDSOR TOWN HALL GREEN
